title: So where do we go to report obvious elo boosting?
body:
Does reporting players actually do anything? Why isn't there a report for ELO boosting option?
I've seen a bunch of these recently.

replies.body:
>inb4 it's not a booster at all

Name-calling is not allowed anywhere on the boards. Read the [rules](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules).

If you're that concerned, then you can always submit a support ticket to deal with it.
